nodes.text: Jedi Starfighter: Prima's Official Game Guide
Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter: Prima's Official Game Guide was a strategy book for Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter by Prima Games. It was released on May 21 2002.

The guide detailed coverage of both the PlayStation 2 and XBox versions of the game. It contained a detailed walkthrough out the game. Also included were comprehensive level descriptions and combat tips for helping to beat the more difficult foes of the game.
